Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel, very nice staff and breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Javier1954
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel dei consoli 6 nights 5 week vacation around europe looking back probably best 4 star hotel stayed italy france room wasnt overly large clean well presented required considering day exploring rome location quite funky street full fashion shops places eat 10mins walk st peters basilica around 60 mins walk ate night different around hotel stumbled upon throughout travels breakfast hotel great pastries cold meats cereals toast fruit waiter make whatever style coffee want good made point couple every morning thoroughly recommend staying wanting good value well presented hotel explore rome booked 4 months arriving expedia got great rate stay return

Reviews.Title: “Not flashy but very good and excellent value”
Reviews.Author: mungo777Omaha
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel dei consoli two nights first week june enjoyed stay much luca front desk wonderful ready advice restaurants assistance directions whenever stopped speak front desk personnel also courteous ready assist whatever needed room 2nd floor smaller hotel rooms usa make available space atmosphere welcoming room bathroom clean even mini bar room space available need add snack drink market next hotel television room small limited 2 english speaking channels breakfast good nice variety meats yogurts pastries breads fruits along scrambled eggs juice favorite cappuccino excellent server breakfast room friendly helpful also laptop available 1st floor needed internet access charge one hour euro 3 months initial use time please note printer connected laptop overall good stay hotel dei consoli would stay go back rome thing would hotel call taxi us downside stay company called times needed taxi arrived euro already meter meter starts accept call hotel save money get taxi street

Reviews.Title: “Good all round value”
Reviews.Author: sandarab
Reviews.Content: fantastic hotel small rooms perfectly exceptionally clean rooms cleaned daily bed turned time got back breakfast reasonable wonderful setting roof garden lovely views best bit wonderful helpful staff gave us many ideas make two nights three days excellent hotel would stay

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel at a good location in Madrid”
Reviews.Author: Ravish D
Reviews.Content: location great felt safe secure front desk open staff welcoming accomodating property comfortable elegant right heated towel bars bathroom convenient metro close st peters day chose visit husband went ahead stand line rest us breakfast inside vatican 830 getting huge jump tourists due great location speaking open service early 730 thought great could get early breakfast delicious food provided amazing variety americans rome really enjoyed appreciated international assortment provided especially scrambled eggs version bacon every day dont get wrong love typical cappucino pastry health reasons needed start day internet service convenient time got code used course days instead buy time use one sitting stayed consoli days left realized packed way much stuff carry next leg journey returning consoli last night rome departing home allowed us leave luggage much appreciated best possible hotel us rome nothing love highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Not that great”

Reviews.Content: stayed recently business trip rome took along friend needed room two twin beds two us room way small well room stuffy needed fresh air way get air open window street noisy turn ac may june part staff accomodating friendly luca star others true meaning providing customer service suggested many good restaurants within walking distance make sure great meals breakfast typical italy sufficient common areas drink relaxing seem working rooftop area make lounge sort location perfect vatican catching hop bus interested would stay could bigger room alone room spotlessly clean

Reviews.Title: “Average - But will go back again”
Reviews.Author: Friendlyface097
Reviews.Content: unfortunately dei consoli ideal hotel tourists public rooms relax say drink dinner public room small breakfast area breakfast good hot food scrambled egg type thin ham although dish quite lots cakes cold meat like sort thing breakfast rooms big enough single bed put double beds enough room walk around bathroom door managed open without hitting sink shower hidden away behind door dont ask reception advice eat first night sent local restaurant standard food cost average half way meal asked dei consoli seemed us got sending us however rome beautiful went wed try get somewhere stay area lots restaurants choose centre sightseeing vatican end dei consoli take good walking shoes streets feet

Reviews.Title: “DONT STAY HERE!! NO WIFI OR AC!”
Reviews.Author: steveg2000
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel easter break booked junior suite four us 2 adults 2 gave us another room addition junior suite rooms small elegant breakfast good cappucino great hotel clean wellappointed great location spite terrible rain easter days managed walk everywhere location lovely nice shops good eateries ate place across street hotel times called good pizza pasta etc best thing hotel proximity vatican seeing st peters highlight trip

Reviews.Title: “good hotel, not in the center but has a very good price/value balance”
Reviews.Author: sotir_loredana
Reviews.Content: start apology taking long write review wonderful hotel wife stayed four nights second week january weather sights foot hotel thanks even managed visit wonderful places pointed us map hotel small one cleanest hotels ever stayed around bit fresh towels linen daily basis dont get many places large number bars restaurants area expensive compared uk however thanks fabulous found great bar next street live music every night band fab even amazed turns ask nicely show would also like thank excellent service impeccable breakfast also knowledgeable help whatever way fact staff pleasant helpful includes friendly porter definite must return full marks hotel

Reviews.Title: “Above average hotel with superb transport links”
Reviews.Author: procopeo
Reviews.Content: stayed dei consoli four nights rome november 7 11 2007 room spotlessly clean quiet comfortable staff pleasant helpful buffet breakfast varied plentiful gracious service delicious location conveniently near ottaviano metro stop within brief walk st peters vatican museums castel st made great touring lines st peters vatican museums close meant could enjoy lovely breakfast still first line area well served bus system also found way around rome quite easily hotel located pricey upscale neighborhood may best shopping felt safe hours

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, friendly but not el cheapo”
Reviews.Author: valleypieman
Reviews.Content: good hotel vatican area rome frontdesk reasonably helpful breakfast good large selection choose

Reviews.Title: “Find another place to stay, the staff is rude!”
Reviews.Author: gorditosan
Reviews.Content: pleased stay dei consoli rooms huge spotlessly clean well sound disappointment fact tea coffee making facilities would expect 4 star hotel staff pleasant helpful able leave luggage hotel checking could use rooftop terrace toilet facilities airport taxi arranged hotel worth 40 euro us location great st peters vatican prepared waited 2 hours get vatican also great indoor market road selling fresh fruit pasta wine cheese etc breakfast eggs cheese bread fruit etc amazing croissants filled eating best place trastevere great atmosphere plenty taxi rank around corner hotel cost us 8 euros trastevere would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel, but everything costs extra”
Reviews.Author: luitome
Reviews.Content: sister booked hotel dei consoli sisters first time choice 3 star near termini cheaper course chose hotel seemed quite luxurious great location werent disappointed stayed rome two times really enjoyed hotel last two times boyfriend budget stayed near termini happy pay time would recommend family friends yes wasnt cheap room cosy small cosy dont want stay near train station weve find bargain finding cost little bit stretch want avoid budget experience stay lovely location enjoy excellent service choose hotel hotel seems cheap used international 4 star hotels may find breakfast little dull love location surrounding excellent restaurants rate night including breakfast location excellent shopping street within 5 minutes walking distance vatican museum also pleasant walk plaza di plaza di spagna onto via del corso di trevi taxi bus main plaza near hotel via dei corso monument 5 minutes walking room clean cosy comfortable beds tea coffee making bathroom clean comfortable shower reception friendly welcoming also helpful recommending restaurants bus routes average enjoyable filling

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic breakfast! But no food until 20:30!”
Reviews.Author: Little-Fruit-Bat
Reviews.Content: excellent location quiet surroundings hotel staff nice rooms great good selection breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Good value - great breakfast”
Reviews.Author: travel4workandplay
Reviews.Content: 4 night stay hotel dei consoli august great time weather really hot coming back air conditioned room hotel yes room small didnt spend much time room didnt really matter large comfy bed really good shower room main road honestly say never disturbed traffic noise found staff one gentlemen reception helpful kept luggage us ready go airport went hotel pick luggage gave us access really good great short break beautiful city staying lovely hotel

Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean and close to the metro!”
Reviews.Author: Lovestotravel_8
Reviews.Content: boyfriend booked last minute holiday rome end feb year booked travel agent didnt know expect rushed decision hotel little tucked away charm lovely shops walk isnt impressive staff take room really lovely hotel upgraded us room balcony although small nice touch rooms clean tidy fairly small rome spending much time anyway breakfast really enjoyable man served coffees ever friendly welcoming food wonderful definately ask make best location wise great stones throw away city st peters pretty much every walkable go metro line one euro travel 90 mins metro fabulous careful though stop running much earlier london many things see rome location hotel fabulous lovely places tucked away near river st peters real thinking going rome hotel truly lovely thanks wonderful stay

Reviews.Title: “Not bad, but i'v experienced better”
Reviews.Author: newbury2003
Reviews.Content: lovely hotel convenient location yes room little small length time actually room fine bathroom clean nice soft fluffy towels every day staff helpful friendly especially waiter breakfast room especially pleasant breakfast plentiful good choice peters square 5 minutes walk away attractions easily accessible foot metro one word warning though careful metro valuables unfortunately husband wallet stolen metro thankfully much money wallet inconvenient cancel cards etc seems common aware valuables rome lovely city visit plenty make sure youve got comfy shoes overall hotel excellent value paid would definitely stay recommend anyone

Reviews.Title: “Small room, naff breakfast”
Reviews.Author: philsayer
Reviews.Content: wife parents stayed hotel consoli stay 4 nights treat parents location excellent vatican 5 mins walk sites via buses taxis hotel clean rooms bit compact staff welcoming apart one woman reception dont think knew smile staff spoke good english gave us good tips local restaurants would definately recommend round corner full breakfast good offering good selection hotel main street good shopping also good shop next door selling like sort thing would also recommend tour bus picked round corner tickets got hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good but not wonderful”
Reviews.Author: Domhnall
Reviews.Content: seven us 5 nights april 07 somewhat since usually like stay historic center since planned see vatican museum high ratings tripadvisor got good deal expedia stayed dei consoli glad wonderful hotel staff outstanding fabrizio front desk breakfast room especially praise rooms lovely spotless surprisingly quiet yes small rome great spot claim place line early entrance vatican museum short walk metro stop dont afraid try bus routes well able get everywhere quite easily using bus via di via half block away would definitely stay recommend highly

Reviews.Title: “Pollution”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: daughters booked 2 rooms week long stay rome meet one old friends hotel location great walking distance vatican old rome sites even though rooms small clean well staff nice helpful breakfast buffet fresh healthy coffee great paid euros per room per night think high property rome friends paid hotel euros per room per night booked travel agent shop around book hotel web site

Reviews.Title: “Perfect hotel”
Reviews.Author: YUNI
Reviews.Content: stayed february 2006 four nights would hard pressed find fault hotel whilst rooms small fairly typical italian hotels general lacked size made comfort whilst situated busy road heart vatican city rooms peaceful relaxing beds incredibly comfortable breakfast usual continental affair beautifully presented waiters consistently helpful pleasant whilst walk major attractions rome offer take good half hour foot reach trevi fountain area city hand castel sant vatican museum st peters etc 5 mins away great base wanting spend lot time exploring part city would definately return fact wish returned rome december booked hotel piazza barberini central location almost ripped staff stuck hotel dei consoli
